description: This file defines the AccessControl struct within the WPEFramework::Core namespace. It provides static methods for managing file ownership and permissions on POSIX systems, including changing owner/group and permissions, as well as applying combined access control settings based on a NodeId object.

classes.name: AccessControl
classes.description: A struct providing static methods to manage file ownership and permissions, mainly for POSIX systems.

methods.name: uint32_t OwnerShip(const string & node,const string & userName,const string & groupName)
methods.description: Sets the ownership of a specified file node to the given user and group; uses POSIX APIs on POSIX systems.

methods.name: uint32_t Permission(const string & node,const uint16_t modeFlags)
methods.description: Sets the permissions of a file node based on mode flags; uses POSIX chmod API.

methods.name: uint32_t Apply(const Core::NodeId & node)
methods.description: Applies ownership and permission settings to a node based on its NodeId attributes.

ctags.name: OwnerShip
ctags.pattern: /^        static uint32_t OwnerShip(const string& node, const string& userName, const string& grou/
ctags.signature: (const string & node,const string & userName,const string & groupName)

ctags.name: Permission
ctags.pattern: /^        static uint32_t Permission(const string& node, const uint16_t modeFlags){$/
